title: Did the media ignore President Trump's signature of a clean - up ocean bill?
subtitle: Despite what was said in a Facebook diary, the October 2018 "Ocean Rescue Act" received more national press coverage than Obama signed a similar bill in almost 2012.
author: David Emery
vclaim: President Trump signed legislation in October 2018 to clean up tons of garbage from oceans and lakes, but the main media did not report it.
